articles.description: His finest performance was a grouchy accountant in The Lunchbox, for which he was honoured at Cannes
articles.content:
Irrfan Khan, the actor, who has died aged 53, was a huge star in Bollywood and found fame in the West with Jurassic World, Slumdog Millionaire, Life Of Pi and The Amazing Spider-Man.
Few of these displayed Khans full talents, though he made the best of the p… [+547 chars]
